chapters.title: Chapter 2: Taken
chapters.info: Chiad, p. 106 (110)—Maiden of the Spear of the Stones River sept of the Goshien Aiel. She is short for an Aiel woman, and has blonde hair. Gaul wants her to marry him, but she will not give up the spear. She is willing to be his lover, but marriage is out of the question (or so she says). She is first-sister to Bain, and the two serve as a sort of guard for Faile. She and Bain were captured along with Faile by the Shaido and made gai'shain. See also Bain; Gaul.
